scripts.deploy: npx graph deploy baseswap-base-goerli-prices --version-label v0.0.1-new-version --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy  --deploy-key --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.deploy-satsuma: graph deploy gmx-arbitrum-prices --version-label $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date '+%y%m%d%H%M%S')-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $(cat .satsuma_token)
